title: Why Do I Catastrophize Everything?
description:
On today’s show, we hear from:
- A woman desperate to stop assuming the worst-case scenario in every life situation
- A newly married man also navigating the adoption of his nephew
- A disabled veteran anxious about starting his career over at age 58
Lyrics of the Day: "Don't Stop Believin" - Journey
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
